TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit QualifierData extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含关于 WMI 限定符的信息。

span.span: Contains information about a WMI qualifier.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例使用类列出有关**Win32_Service**类的限定符信息。The following example lists qualifier information about the **Win32_Service** class using the class. 有关**Win32_Service**的详细信息, 请参阅[Windows Management Instrumentation](/windows/desktop/wmisdk/wmi-start-page)文档。For more information about **Win32_Service**, see the [Windows Management Instrumentation](/windows/desktop/wmisdk/wmi-start-page) documentation. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsAmended { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsAmended : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示限定符是否已修正。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the qualifier is amended.

value.span: 返回一个 值，该值指示限定符是否已修正。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the qualifier is amended.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 修正限定符是可通过 WMI 本地化其值的限定符。Amended qualifiers are qualifiers whose value can be localized through WMI. 本地化限定符驻留在 WMI 中的单独命名空间中, 并可在检索到基本类定义时合并。Localized qualifiers reside in separate namespaces in WMI and can be merged into the basic class definition when retrieved. ## 属性值Property Value `true`如果修正此限定符, 则为;否则为`false`。`true` if this qualifier is amended; otherwise, `false`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[从部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

public: property bool IsLocal { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示限定符是在此类上本地定义的还是从基类传播的。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the qualifier has been defined locally on this class or has been propagated from a base class.

value.span: 返回一个 值，该值指示限定符是在此类上本地定义的还是从基类传播的。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the qualifier has been defined locally on this class or has been propagated from a base class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 属性值Property Value `true`如果已在此类上本地定义限定符, 则为; 否则为。否则为`false`。`true` if the qualifier has been defined locally on this class; otherwise, `false`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[从部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the value of the qualifier can be overridden when propagated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 属性值Property Value `true`如果在传播时可以重写限定符的值, 则为;否则为`false`。`true` if the value of the qualifier can be overridden when propagated; otherwise, `false`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[从部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否将限定符传播给类的实例。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the qualifier should be propagated to instances of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 属性值Property Value `true`如果此限定符应传播到类的实例, 则为; 否则为。否则为`false`。`true` if this qualifier should be propagated to instances of the class; otherwise, `false`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[从部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ Value { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };
member this.Value : obj with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置限定符的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the qualifier.

value.span: 返回一个 值，该值包含限定符的值。

span.span: Returns an value containing the value of the qualifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 限定符只能为以下 CIM 类型子集: string、uint16、uint32、sint32、uint64、sint64、real32、real64 或 bool。Qualifiers can only be of the following subset of CIM types: string, uint16, uint32, sint32, uint64, sint64, real32, real64, or bool. ## 属性值Property Value 限定符的值。The value of the qualifier. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[从部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下面的示例使用类列出有关**Win32_Service**类的限定符信息。The following example lists qualifier information about the **Win32_Service** class using the class. 有关**Win32_Service**的详细信息, 请参阅[Windows Management Instrumentation](/windows/desktop/wmisdk/wmi-start-page)文档。For more information about **Win32_Service**, see the [Windows Management Instrumentation](/windows/desktop/wmisdk/wmi-start-page) documentation.
